column5: Hi fellow members:  Wify let me go overnight crappie fishing from 10:30pm to 5:00am tommorrow night. This is once in a life time chance-you know what I mean. Need some advise is it worth to try and anyone has any success in it? I am planning to Rice or Lakefield.  Thanks in advance !
Bring a heater lol. I love night fishing for them. Minnows are so key, Glow sticks and watching your bobber move back and forth:)
From my personal experience, small minnows, work the water too, and move it around every now and then.   Good luck!
If your fishin from shore try to find an area with lights. Crappies will move in to these areas because the bait fish are attracted to the light
Hey, I could fish with ya.  Check out the report I`m putting up
